title: "Artificial intelligence used in male infertility scoring"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) is being used to evaluate tissue samples in men who produce low levels of, or no, sperm. Researchers at Toho University School of Medicine in Japan tested whether or not the Google Cloud Automated Machine learning (AutoML) Vision platform could be used to carry out the traditional Johnson scoring method,"
